title: We Are Waiting for the Morning

verses.text:
We are waiting for the morning,
When the night of sin is o'er,
And the everlasting day-light
Shall arise to set no more.

We are waiting for the morning,
When the Saviour shall appear,
And the shadows and the darkness
Of this world shall disappear.

We are waiting for the morning,
When the curse shall be no more,
And the nations of the blessed
Shall rejoice from shore to shore.

We are waiting for the morning,
When the bride hath made her ready,
And the New Jerusalem cometh
Down from God to earth so steady.

We are waiting for the morning,
O how long the night appears!
But we know the day is coming,
It may come this very year.

We are waiting for the morning,
For the bright and glorious day,
When our earthly house of tabernacle
Shall be changed to house of clay.
